title: Love Forever After
overview: A love story between the god of Death and a beautiful ghost who refuses to go to the world of the dead.A wandering Toilet spirit meets Mr. Grim Reaper. He takes her to the hall of divine judgment, but she began to resist violently and in desperation tried to return to her lifeless body.The Grim Reaper could not take her away, so he had no choice, and he offered her a deal. He will help her return to her body if she completes one mission. She agreed to this deal, not even suspecting that an impossible task was waiting for her. While the Toilet is fulfilling its mission, Mr. Grim Reaper, deprived of all memory, begins to recall his past. Will their love last forever?
